actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for cooperation between the armed forces and Federal drug enforcement officials.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Defense to provide Federal drug enforcement officials with any information, equipment facilities, training personnel, or advisors which may be helpful to enforcing Federal laws relating to the use of controlled substances. Permits drug officials to provide training and advice to members of the armed forces on the identification of drug traffickers and any other matter related to controlled substances.

titles.title: A bill to provide for cooperation between the armed forces and Federal drug enforcement officials.
